name: Refresh Token
description:
The Refresh Access Token API is used to refresh the LoginRadius Access Token or the Provider Access Token, after authentication.

Supported Providers: Email, Facebook, Yahoo, Google, Apple.

Please contact the LoginRadius support team to enable this API.

Get Params.name: expiresIn
Get Params.description: Allows you to specify a desired expiration time in minutes for the newly issued access_token.

Get Params.name: isWeb
Get Params.description: Set to false, if it's Native access token. By default its true for Apple .
